rating.title: How did you like the image?

advice.tip1: You can improve your images by adding a style to your text, for example "an image in anime style" or "a painting in impressionist style".
advice.tip2: Details matter: try to be specific in your description, mention colors, textures, lighting and composition to get better results.
advice.tip3: Use visual references in your description: mention famous artists, movies, or paintings to guide the result towards a specific visual style.
advice.tip4: Experiment with different keywords: terms like "cinematic", "hyperrealistic", "watercolor" or "digital art" can completely transform the result.
advice.tip5: Describe the atmosphere and emotion you want: adding words like "dramatic", "serene", "nostalgic" or "vibrant" helps capture the right feeling.
advice.tip6: Try variations of your prompt: small changes in word order or synonyms can produce unexpectedly different results.
advice.tip7: Combine techniques and styles: "a portrait in Caravaggio style with surrealist elements" or "a digital art landscape with neon lighting" creates unique and interesting compositions.
